bug.author: uipo78
bug.summary: No SSO buttons appear on login page
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
No SSO buttons appear on the login page. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
I followed <denchmark-link:https://docs.polyaxon.com/integrations/sso-azure/>these instructions</denchmark-link> , enabling Azure SSO and including all of the requisite values (client id, client secret, etc.). <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
I expected to see a "Log in with Azure" button (or the like) at the login screen. I also expected that the settings page would reflect the fact that I enabled Azure SSO (the AUTH_AZURE:ENABLED section remained blank). <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Kubernetes. Deployed Polyaxon 0.5.3.

comments.comment: I think there's a small UI bug, for the enabled dropdown, it requires a state change, just select False, and then True, and then save.
